messages.subject: defense against untruths
messages.msgSnippet: So... On a list I m not on someone is being divisive and derisive. I could ve ignored it as Jr. High girl behavior had it not contained a lie about one of my
messages.messageBody:
So...
On a list I'm not on someone is being divisive and derisive.
I could've ignored it as Jr. High girl behavior had it not contained a lie
about one of my children.

If someone could pass this on to that list, if anyone recognizes the
situation, that would be nice.
http://sandradodd.com/detractors

I'm leaving for a conference now.
Please be patient if approvals of moderated posts take a while on this list,
as some moderators will be at the Live and Learn conference.

Thanks!!

Sandra


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
